ensconce.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to settle yourself in a place where you feel comfortable and safe
ensconce.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Nick was comfortably ensconced in front of the TV set.
Agnes had ensconced herself in the best bedroom.
ensconce.translation[0].definitions[0].n: Ensconce is usually either passive or reflexive (=followed by myself/herself etc)
